Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Prohibits ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment or not-for-profit venue
Summary: Prohibits ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment or not-for-profit venue; provides that a violation of such provisions constitutes a misdemeanor punishable by a fine and imprisonment for a period not to exceed one year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to prohibiting ticket sales that exceed the capacity of a place of entertainment or not-for-profit venue
